ROM.Changelog:
Update:- 17-02-2018
- Merged Feb security patch - Rootless subs support - Always on display - Lockscreen Visualizer - Ambient Visualizer (WIP) - Xiaomi Doze - Added PixelStyle - New snap cam with new UI - Omnivision sensor fixups - Tissot Blobs - Statusbar clock and date customizations - Statusbar battery customizations - Added custom headers from omni - Option to display data disabled icon - Allow disabling FC dialogues - Dialer: Auto Proximity Speakerphone - Added Google Sound search tile - Merged latest CAF tag in kernel - Added wireguard support - And minor fixups
